item.title: MIUI OS2.0.101.0.VMVCNXM Recovery update for MIX Fold 3 China
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: MIX Fold 3 China

Codename: babylon

Version: OS2.0.101.0.VMVCNXM | 15.0

Size: 7.1 GB

MD5: 494e2e378cb7a2105463eeaf1035cc15

Changelog:
[System]
New: Support for one-tap clipboard clearing
Optimization: Bluetooth status bar icon
[Control center]
New: Flashlight brightness adjustment page
New: Certain devices now support adjustable flashlight brightness
New: Notification spotlight for flashlight
[Xiaomi HyperConnect]
New: Support for file transfers between different devices using different Xiaomi Accounts
Optimization: Device connection pop-ups
[Gallery]
Optimization: "On this day" feature now supports hiding content
Optimization: Day and month views are available for the start page
Optimization: Search results page can now show the progress of Gallery analysis by AI
Optimization: Search results for identification documents
Optimization: Display layouts for Gallery items
Optimization: Gallery now supports deleting and hiding items via long pressing
Optimization: Search results for time and location keywords
Fix: CAD images were mistakenly placed in Gallery
[Xiaomi Hyper XiaoAi]
Your smart personal assistant
路 New visuals with multiple ways to activate the assistant anytime you need it.
Multimodal interaction: Perceive the world around you with your camera and easily recognize objects that appear on your screen.
路 Improved search: Supports natural language searches for photos, videos, documents, notes, and recordings.
Smart scenes: Seamlessly integrates system features, letting you perform complex tasks with a single step. This feature also learns your patterns to offer helpful services proactively.
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Notifications weren't displayed correctly in some cases

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.9.0.UMVCNXM Recovery update for MIX Fold 3 China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: MIX Fold 3 China

Codename: babylon

Version: OS1.0.9.0.UMVCNXM | 14.0

Size: 6.9 GB

MD5: 14d1a69a542c786b113bc8a6aefab8ac

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Improved app preloading to enhance app startup speed
Optimization: New startup animation strategy reduces app launch delays
Optimization: Improved system resource recovery strategy when switching apps to enhance app smoothness
Optimization: Optimized memory usage to improve the smoothness of TikTok (Douyin)
Updated the security patch to July 2024. Increased system security.
[Widgets]
New: Travel assistant can remind you of train and flight schedules for more convenient travel (requires upgrading App vault to version 5.12.2 or above, Messaging to version 15.0.2.24 or above, and Mi AI Engine to version 2.2 or above from GetApps).
Optimization: App vault loading speed
Fix: Zoom animation was abnormal when tapping the Music widget
Fix: A rare display issue occurred when adding the Clock widget

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
